dmca.title: DMCA - Notice of Copyright Infringement at http://www.sternchat.com/.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Dermos, Despina [mailto:ddermos@playboy.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 11, 2005 9:27 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; The Planet Policy Enforcement;
admins@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA - Notice of Copyright Infringement at
http://www.sternchat.com/.

 

February 11, 2005

 

VIA E-MAIL 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

copyright@theplanet.com

abuse@theplanet.com

admins@theplanet.com

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

It has been brought to our attention that web pages at 

http://www.sternchat.com/

http://www.sternchat.com/boards/showthread.php?t=11103

http://www.sternchat.com/boards/showthread.php?t=11165

display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy
Enterprises International, Inc. ("Playboy").  All right, title and interest
in and to these images belongs to Playboy.

 

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on 

http://www.sternchat.com/

http://www.sternchat.com/boards/showthread.php?t=11103

http://www.sternchat.com/boards/showthread.php?t=11165

are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

 

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy
copyrighted images on 

http://www.sternchat.com/

http://www.sternchat.com/boards/showthread.php?t=11103

http://www.sternchat.com/boards/showthread.php?t=11165

and on all web pages under your control.  

 

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at

http://www.sternchat.com/

http://www.sternchat.com/boards/showthread.php?t=11103

http://www.sternchat.com/boards/showthread.php?t=11165.

 

I, Despina Dermos, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf
of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned
unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images.  My contact
information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., 680 N.
Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax 312-266-2042, phone
312-751-8000, E-mail address is ddermos@playboy.com.

 

This is a serious matter, which needs to be resolved immediately.  We expect
that all Playboy copyrighted images will be removed within 48 hours of your
receipt of this email. 

 

This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights
and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise.  Any and
all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. 

 

Sincerely,

 

PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC. 

 

Despina Dermos

Intellectual Property Enforcement Assistant

 

cc:        Ana E. Cashman, Esq.
